tool_description: Saves, loads, and manages reusable prayer schedule templates for different life situations and spiritual seasons.

action.description: Template action: save, load, list, delete, duplicate

template_name.description: Name of the template to save/load/delete

schedule_id.description: Schedule ID to save as template (for save action)

template_category.description: Template category: daily_routine, retreat, seasonal, special_occasions, travel

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [save, load, list, delete, duplicate]
Template name required: Provide template_name for save, load, delete, or duplicate actions
Schedule ID required: Provide schedule_id when saving a template
Template not found: The specified template name does not exist
Invalid template category: Use one of [daily_routine, retreat, seasonal, special_occasions, travel]
Template name already exists: Choose a different name or use duplicate action
usage: Specify action and user ID. For save/load/delete actions, provide template_name. For save action, include schedule_id. Optionally set template category for organization.

available_templates.description: Array of available template names (for list action)

template_details.description: Summary of template contents (for load/save actions)
